projects.title: These are some of my projects
projects.description: I've created web and mobile apps, starting from an idea, going through a UI prototype, laying it out in HTML/CSS and then developing the modules of the app. This is a selection of them.
projects.textMoreProjects: I like to learn and experiment with more technologies in Open Source projects

card_1.title: Brief story
card_1.content: Since 2015 I started creating my first websites. I learned the basics of HTML at a very young age, and over the years I have supplemented my knowledge with CSS and JavaScript. I have worked with Vue and Angular, but React.js is my preferred library.

card_2.title: Today
card_2.content: As a FrontEnd developer I can now build, design and deploy sites using good practices. I'm still learning about web UX design, UI prototyping, and new JS libraries.

card_3.title: More data
content: About 7 years programming, and with work experience.
I'm Software Development graduate of the National Institute of Technology.
